Hey there,

New day, new you, new version of PowerCam. Huzzah!

The super update is our core function changes from photo taking to video shooting! PowerCam now is the versatile free teleprompter app for your iPhone.

Check out the brand new features:
- Embedded teleprompter, prompt while shooting for fluent videos
- Speechtrack, automatically scrolling the script as you speak in real time
- Smart Powertrim, trim your video by selecting words, save time during post-editing
- Automatic Captions, one tap to add subtitles in sync with your narration

We'd love to hear your feedback: powercam@wondershare.com

Best,
The PowerCam Team
